name.baseName: Pickled vegetables ; Mustard, leafy vegetables, beans, garlic, rootstocks, squash heads ; Washing + pickling/salting + desalting + dehydration + soaking ; All sizes; NESPS2
酱腌菜 ; 芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、蒜类、根茎类、榨菜头 ; 水洗+腌制/盐渍+脱盐+脱水+渍制 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业流程涉及生产多种腌制蔬菜，包括芥菜、叶菜、豆类、大蒜、根茎和榨菜头。该流程包括洗涤、腌制/盐渍、脱盐、脱水和浸泡的阶段。这些腌制蔬菜适用于人类消费，满足各种烹饪口味和保存需求。所述的管道末端管理技术用于处理食品加工产生的废水中的污染物，如化学需氧量、氨氮、磷和有机结合氮。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1371文件，在完整版文件中第2632页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为酱腌菜，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisChemical coagulation + SBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management77，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是化学混凝+SBR法，其效率为77，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是厌氧生物+好氧生物处理法，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + SBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝+SBR法，其效率为89，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
